const Hero = ({ hero, herosId, setHerosId }) => { const ps = hero.powerstats return ( <>
{hero.name}
  • {`Inteligence: ${ps.intelligence}`}
  • {`Strength: ${ps.strength}`}
  • {`Speed: ${ps.speed}`}
  • {`Durability: ${ps.durability}`}
  • {`Power: ${ps.power}`}
  • {`Combat: ${ps.combat}`}

Details
) } export default Hero
